It was great for the party and  everyday wear.
I’m not a huge blouse girl because I like to be comfortable but this was amazing!  It was so comfy and festive for the holidays.

The blouse fit true to size. It arrived on time but very wrinkled so I steamed it and all wrinkles quickly went away. It's a lovely white satin blouse that I can wear alone or layer under a sweater or blazer.

The blouse arrived totally wrinkled.  I realized I would never be able to wear it without ironing!  I do not iron!  Color was a little darker than it appears online.  I was very disappointed because this was to be my Christmas blouse.

Nice sheen and weight.

This shirt, with the lantern sleeves, does feel very blousey and poofy. It’s also runs a bit large.  The fabric is soft and silky. The part I did not like at all is that any little thing will stain this shirt. Get a drop of water on the shirt while washing your hands? Now it shows up for the rest of the day. I have not gotten through a whole day of wearing this shirt without having to throw it in the wash again!
Great item fits perfectly the first time. I love it.
The color of this blouse is beautiful.  Very versatile.  It's an all-season blouse.
True to size.Color is nice
It fit perfect
Love the material, not see through at all.  Good quality, I will order another one in a different color. It came very wrinkled, it took steaming it twice very slowly.
Very pretty attractive
I was skeptical, but I needed a specific looking black shirt quickly. Fit well, and good quality.
The fabric felt pretty cheap and is pretty easily seen through
Very flattering and comfortable

Wore this to church this morning and got so many compliments.  It feels so soft and fits great!!

评论概述: The blouse looks great and fits well.
评论详情: The quality of the material was well stitched.
The blouse is well made and the color is perfect for my needs. It fit well and adds a touch of elegance to my outfit whether a nice skirt or casual look. Love it!

This silky/ satin blouse is everything as stated in the product description and more. The material feels wonderful to the touch. For those of us that may have thicker arms, the sleeves of this blouse gives you room to move. The blouse may run slightly roomier, but once on the material drapes over your body beautifully. This is not a judgemental body hugging blouse. The blouse is long enough to wear with different shirt tucks. I prefer a front tuck when wearing my jeans, and with a skirt for a more polished look, there's definitely enough material for a full tuck. I find this blouse to be very versatile. Enjoy!
great fitting top, I ordered the green beautiful color for the holidays. I am 5'9 150lb medium fit well
El color me gusta.

Había comprado dos blusas de otra marca que me encantaron, por eso cuando ví el diseño de esta pensé que me iba a gustar tanto como las otras, pero me equivoqué, el material se siente barato y el diseño no se ajusta bien. Si puedo, la voy a devolver.
Seems to run a little big but it worked great for a Howl costume!

This blouse is silky, satiny, well made, and very feminine. I had to return the first one because it was way too small. I went with the XL because it showed the bust size as being closer to my size, but it wasn't. I then ordered a 2XL. It's a little loose, but that's fine with me. It is inexpensive, but doesn't look or feel that way. I recommend it, but I would say order 1 size up from your regular size.

评论概述: Pretty and true to size from the size guide
评论详情: I bought this shirt for something nice to wear to church and under my suit jacket and vests. Its prettier than I thought. a little dressier than I first thought but happily surprised!  I did check the size guide and then measured. It was a perfect fit! definitely recommend and will be checking for other colors!
Quality, flattering, comfortable value! Loved the color. The xxl was to big! I returned it for an xl and that fit perfectly! I’m 5’4 and about 180 pounds
This blouse was very soft and silky fill-in. The color was perfect and I got a lot of compliments while wearing it.
Looks as pictured. Rich burgundy color; soft satin feel. No flimsy material.
The body of this shirt is just too flowy for me, it kind of swallows my short, wide torso.

I am returning it because it had a grease stain or something on it. But...I am going to get another one...I love the color-Beige, and I love the shoulders on this as well, they are puckered or puffed a little. I would also say it runs a little small. I purchased an XL according to the size chart and it was a little tight across the chest. Overall 8/10

This is not purple in my opinion. It’s more like a dark Plum color.  It’s not at all like the color pictured.  I need a purple blouse for a specific occasion. The blouse itself is very nice. Nice silky material and fit is good.  I would definitely keep if the color was right.

This blouse was packed and shipped properly. Good quality and easy care, as shown. I bought an XXL because most of the blouses I order run small. This blouse is true to size. Looks and fits nice and loose. I felt amazing in this blouse.
Too wrinkled.
Fits as expected & comfortably. The material is breathable
Looks really nice. Great for a date night outfit. It’s soft and smooth. I love how it looks on. I’d get another in a different color too!
This is a great buy for the money. Certainly not couture but does the trick with jeans - as depicted.
Love the shirt!!!

While it’s a pretty concept, it came so wrinkled that I can’t get all the wrinkles out, even through washing, pressing, etc. so now ruins the look. The button placement is not right - at one point, button is too high - the next button, too low.  Cheap fabric.  I’d return except I threw away the packaging already.  Save your money on this one.
This is a very nice blouse for either under a jacket or casual wear.  I like it very much.  Cat-Mom
Requires too much by hand care
Love this. Looks great and is comfortable. Received many compliments!
Got this as a gift for my daughter in law.  It is really soft and the fit is perfect.
Pretty shirt but rips very easy
I received so many compliments when I wore this blouse. Nice & comfortable.
Fits perfectly

Packing wrinkles did not come out even after two washes and line dry. We even tried to stream them out without success. Still has visible wrinkles, but not as much as at first. Not going to try a 30-year-old iron without a special sleeve attachment. Not going to buy a modern iron just for this. It's comfortable and nice, but not going to wear it anyplace fancy until the wrinkles, hopefully, come out with several more washes. Minus 1 star.  The ad page says SILK, but it's absolutely not silk. It's polyester spandex. Clearly a bait and switch tactic to trick people that don't read the details. Minus 1 star.
This blouse looks very nice. Good quality and well made. True to size.

评论概述: True to Size - Silk is Stunning
评论详情: This is a beautiful top! It looks best tucked in and is long ebough to do this. The sleeves dont roll up too well, but you can still mnage it. The quality is good and it did survive a wash, dry and ironing!
Love the blouse

The color of this shirt is more of a brown maroon than what shows on the model. The sleeves at the shoulder fit me a bit wonky so I'm not really sure what to think of this shirt.  The fit is decent otherwise but the material isn't as soft. It feels not organic. Im not really sure how to describe it but not really a fan.

评论概述: Fabulous option for that classy satin look
评论详情: This satin blouse is a great addition to any wardrobe! The lantern sleeves and silk fabric give it an elegant, dressy look while remaining comfortable for everyday wear. The button-down design is classic and versatile, suitable for both casual and business settings. A stylish and practical piece that’s perfect for any occasion
I got my normal size XL and it fits great.  Exactly what I expected! I love the silk look, and the color is rich and chic.

Zeagoo never disappoint, this is not my first time ordering from them, they sell some beautiful tops and this is no exception. They use the nicest fabrics. This blouse is sized well and has some nice details to it, like the extended cuffs with the two buttons and the slightly puffed lantern sleeves. I only have one complaint and that is I wish they would stop vacuum sealing garments. Garments are not going to go stale! Other than that this blouse offers superb value for money.  The color was accurate to the sellers photos, as was the style. The finish is excellent with no loose threads. This is a very dressy blouse and would work well tucked into a pencil skirt, or untucked with your favorite pair of jeans. This is a 5 star review for sure.

I’m 172lbs 36DD and ordered a medium. This blouse fit me well with some extra room in the arms and chest area. The material is nice and smooth made of good quality. It feels great and looks very professional.  This shirt doesn’t wrinkle too much which is nice to be able to wear it without stressing. The balloon sleeves are also a nice added touch to make it more dressy. In terms of thickness it’s more on the thing side but would work for warmed or colder temperatures.

This is a very nice blouse for an older teen or adult of all ages who likes a satin feel blouse. It can be worn with dress pants or jeans. I washes it alone on the gentle cycle and hangs it to dry ( even though it can be dried on a low air setting) to eliminate wrinkles.

The blouse comes in a vacuum pack bag that takes up very little space, but creates unbelievable wrinkles that hopefully come out in time. I washes, dried and hung this one with no change. I have a lot of hope for a few more washings that should rid me of wrinkles. The blouse is great looking with a true fit. Soft and comfortable with great length in the sleeves as well as attractive over sized cuffs. Nice enough for gens or concert wear onstage. An all around good addition to the closet.

I like this blouse a lot. It's polished and professional and the satin material is lovely. I'm a 36DD woman size 14 and it fits well. The ONLY thing, is that the sleeves are a bit short on me. I'm 6'0 with longer arms.

This Zeagoo blouse looks good enough to wear to the office.  The purple color is vibrant. My regular medium size fits fine. I took a star off in my rating though since I don't like the slightly puffy shoulders as well as I thought I would.

评论概述: Takes a lot of ironing to get the wrinkles out
评论详情: Well you can see the result of my wife doing all that she could to iron out the wrinkles. She had hope that washing it would take out the wrinkles. Nope. Had to iron it meticulously. She likes the blouse, but it's a lot of work. You can see the difference in the before and after photos which are so obviously different that the don't need to be labeled.

评论概述: Satin dressy shirt that also goes will with jeans
评论详情: If you are a "chesty" gal, then you might want to order a size up. I found this just a tad tight across the chest. A larger size would have been far more comfortable.  Anyway, this is a decently assembled dress/casual shirt. Would look nice with dress pants and a blazer or as a uniform shirt, but it also goes will with jeans and khakis.  Classic look that won't go out of style.

评论概述: It gaps open across the chest.
评论详情: This Zeagoo satin shirt is just okay for me.  Things I like about this shirt: -- The purple color is gorgeous. -- The lantern sleeves aren't crazy poofy. -- I didn't see any sloppy seams or threads sticking out.  Things I don't like about this shirt: -- The buttons gap open across the chest, even when I just put my hands on my hips. I would have to wear this with the first few buttons undone but then that exposes too much cleavage. I'd have to wear something under this shirt and that sucks. -- The fabric is mostly comfortable enough to rest against my sensitive skin but it's not the greatest for me. The feel of the fabric is probably soft enough for most people though. My skin is just wacky. -- Something about the cut isn't very flattering on me but I can't figure out what it is. When I'm wearing this, it just doesn't make me feel more attractive.  So, overall, it's a nice-looking shirt and seems to be made well enough, it just doesn't fully vibe with me for some reason and the chest gapping thing is a major nuisance.

My wife teaches and we are getting her Fall wardrobe ready, and this was one she wanted to try.  As with any piece of clothing that you order online without seeing it in person, there are always slight issues when the piece arrives.  This one has a couple of slight fitting issues but nothing that makes it unwearable.  Overall, its fairly comfortable and looks really nice.  My wife has worn it a couple of times and after washing we don't see any problems so that's a good thing. Time will tell how well it stands up and if something happens, we will be sure to come back and update the review.  As of now, we have no problem recommending the shirt to anyone looking at it right now.

This blouse arrived quickly and was packaged in an air-sealed bag, so it will definitely need to be washed and/or steamed prior to wearing. Fabric has a nice satiny sheen. Item fits true to size. I chose a beige color, as I needed a neutral color that would match well with a variety of slacks/skirts. This is really a very nice, classic blouse. It works well for business environments and church events where something conservative is the best choice. Could be dressed up for a nice dinner or dressed down with jeans for a casual but still stylish look. Great item and I anticipate getting a lot of wear out of it! Extremely pleased with this.

This women’s satin blouse is silky smooth. This dressy casual shirt makes the perfect work shirt. It’s sleek. Medium quality craftsmanship. Nice looking shirt. Fits as expected. Color/ style/ design is as expected. I recommend.

What it is, though, is a nice blouse that fits well if you intend to tuck it in. If not, it's a little on the boxy side and the hem is straight, not curved, so it's not a good look untucked.  The arms are generous so if you have larger upper arms that you have trouble fitting, this is a GREAT choice. It's very plus-size friendly in the arms. I'm short and the double placket on the cuff makes it easy to turn back so it doesn't look too much like I'm a child wearing a grownup shirt (especially since the cut is obviously intended to be looser in the arms).  The fabric is good. It's nice and soft, not like some of the satiny things that can feel like sandpaper on the inside. It's not going to be mistaken for silk. Too shiny. But it's not a cheap-looking fabric, either. It's well made at least to the extent that I can't see any red flags like crooked seams or gaps or thread gnarls dangling.  This would look EXTRA good with a vest because of the nifty sleeves.  At the price, I absolutely do recommend this, especially for the folks with hard to fit arms.

A satin blouse which is soft, silky, comfortable and looks beautiful. Good to pair with pants/skirts/jeans and gives vintage feel/look. Fits right and color is very vibrant. Decent quality and stays wrinkle-free during wear, doesn't look cheap. Very happy with my purchase and recommend
So good quality very classy

评论概述: Lovely, fitted comfortable satiny black blouse
评论详情: Beautiful satin blouse in black. My first black satiny blouse and it feels so soft, airy and flowy. So comfortable yet fitted and not tight. I washed it, dried it for just 3 minutes and removed it promptly. Hung it up. No wrinkles. I wore this tucked in with jeans and heels and it was perfect. Well made. No loose stitches. A good value at the right price point. It would be nice if it came in more colors too!
I love this blouse. Such a beautiful colour and a very flowy satin. Enough space for arms and no boob gaps. Will order other colour soon.
